title: Inception
storyline: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception — planting an idea into someone's subconscious through shared dreaming.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
storyline: Wrongfully imprisoned, a man forms a lifelong friendship and quietly plans a daring escape, all while bringing hope to those around him.

title: The Dark Knight
storyline: Batman faces his greatest psychological and moral challenge yet when Gotham is thrown into chaos by the anarchic Joker.

title: Titanic
storyline: A young couple from different social backgrounds fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic during its maiden voyage.

title: Interstellar
storyline: In a desperate attempt to find a new home for humanity, astronauts travel through a wormhole to explore potentially habitable planets beyond our galaxy.

title: Avengers: Endgame
storyline: The remaining Avengers rally together for one last stand against Thanos in a time-bending quest to restore balance to the universe.

title: Forrest Gump
storyline: A simple man with a kind heart unwittingly influences many historical events while on a lifelong journey to reunite with his childhood love.

title: The Matrix
storyline: A hacker discovers that the world he lives in is a simulated reality and joins a rebellion to free humanity from machine control.

title: Gladiator
storyline: A betrayed Roman general fights his way back to seek vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
storyline: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son and embarks on an inspiring journey to overcome adversity and achieve success.
